family.privacy.description: Configure which member properties are publicly visible for this family. Admin users will always see all data.
family.privacy.infoMessage: Select the properties you want to make public. Unselected properties will be hidden from non-admin users in public APIs.
family.export.title: Export Family Data
family.export.description: Export all data for this family (members, relationships, events) to a JSON file. This file can be used to back up your family tree or import it into another server.
family.import.title: Import Family Data
family.import.description: Import family data from a JSON file. This will create a new family with all its associated members, relationships, and events. Existing data will not be overwritten.
family.import.success: Family data imported successfully! New Family ID: {id}

donate.title: Support App Development
donate.description: If you find this app useful, please consider supporting the author with a coffee to help maintain servers and develop new features. Every contribution is greatly appreciated!
donate.buyMeACoffee: Support via Buy Me a Coffee
donate.momoInstructions: Scan MoMo QR code or transfer to phone number: [Your MoMo Phone Number]
donate.thankYou: Thank you very much for your support!
donate.profileBanner: Help us maintain servers and develop more features.
about.title: About Us
about.welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Family Tree App, your comprehensive solution for managing and visualizing your family's heritage.
about.description: Our application is designed to help you easily build, explore, and preserve your family history.
about.features.title: Key Features
about.features.aiAssistedCreation.title: AI-assisted Member Creation
about.features.aiAssistedCreation.subtit: Smart suggestions to enrich family member profiles.
about.features.visualCharts.title: Visual Genealogy Charts
about.features.visualCharts.subtitle: Interactive and intuitive family tree visualizations.
about.features.relationshipValidation.su: Ensuring accuracy and consistency in family connections.
about.features.historyTracking.title: Comprehensive History Tracking
about.features.historyTracking.subtitle: Document important life events and milestones.
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.description: Our mission is to provide a powerful yet easy-to-use platform that empowers individuals to connect with their roots, discover their ancestry, and share their family stories with future generations. We believe in the importance of heritage and the joy of discovery.
about.donate.title: Support Us
about.donate.description: Developing and maintaining this application requires significant time and effort. If you find the app useful and would like to support us in continued improvements, you can buy the author a coffee.
about.donate.reason: Your support will help us cover server costs, domain fees, and dedicate time to developing new features, fixing bugs, and providing better support.
about.donate.thankYou: Every contribution, no matter how small, is a huge encouragement for us to continue developing this project. Thank you sincerely for your generosity!
about.team.title: The Team
about.team.description: This application is developed by a dedicated team of engineers and designers passionate about genealogy and user-friendly technology. (Placeholder for team member details and roles).
about.contact.title: Contact & Support
about.contact.description: Have questions or need assistance? Please visit our
about.contact.supportTeam: reach out to our support team.
about.credits.title: Team / Credits
about.credits.dataEngine: Data Engine: ASP.NET Core 8 + MySQL (via EF Core)
about.credits.specialThanks: Special thanks: All contributors, testers, and demo families
version.title: App Version
version.description: Stay informed about the latest updates and improvements to the Family Tree App.
version.currentVersion.title: Current Version
version.changelog.title: Changelog Summary
version.changelog.summary: Here's a brief overview of recent changes and new features. For a detailed history, please refer to our official release notes.
version.changelog.bugfix1: Bug Fix: Improved performance on large family trees.
version.changelog.enhancement1: Enhancement: Updated user interface for better readability.
help.title: Help Center
help.description: Find answers to common questions and learn how to make the most of your Family Tree App experience.
help.gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
help.gettingStarted.addMembers.title: Adding New Members
help.gettingStarted.addMembers.subtitle: Navigate to the 'Members' section and click 'Add New Member'. Fill in the details and our AI assistant can help suggest additional information.
help.gettingStarted.editRelationships.su: From a member's profile, you can add or modify relationships with other family members. Our smart validation ensures consistency.
help.gettingStarted.searchTree.title: Searching Your Family Tree
help.gettingStarted.searchTree.subtitle: Use the search bar at the top to quickly find any family member by name or other criteria.
help.gettingStarted.useAIAssistant.title: Using the AI Assistant
help.gettingStarted.useAIAssistant.subti: The AI assistant can help you enrich member biographies, suggest historical facts, and validate data. Look for the AI icon next to input fields.
help.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
help.faq.createTree.title: How do I create a new family tree?
help.faq.createTree.text: Upon first login, you will be prompted to create your initial family. You can also create new families from the dashboard.
help.faq.importData.title: Can I import data from other genealogy software?
help.faq.importData.text: Yes, we support GEDCOM file imports. Look for the import option in the 'Settings' section.
help.faq.shareTree.title: How can I share my family tree with others?
help.faq.shareTree.text: You can invite family members to view or collaborate on your family tree through the sharing settings in the dashboard.
help.furtherAssistance.title: Further Assistance
help.furtherAssistance.description: If you can't find what you're looking for, please refer to our
about.legal.title: Legal / Policies
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction.title: Introduction
terms.introduction.paragraph1: Welcome to the Family Tree App! These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your access to and use of our website, services, and applications (collectively, the 'Service'). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
terms.introduction.paragraph2: The Family Tree App helps you manage and visualize your family members, history, and relationships, with optional AI assistance. Please read these Terms carefully before using our Service.
terms.userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
terms.userResponsibilities.paragraph1: You are responsible for your use of the Service and for any content you provide, including compliance with applicable laws, rules, and regulations. We expect you to use the Service respectfully and responsibly.
terms.userResponsibilities.item1: Provide accurate and truthful information about your family members.
terms.userResponsibilities.item2: Use the AI features responsibly and do not intentionally generate or share false or misleading data.
terms.userResponsibilities.item3: Respect the privacy and intellectual property rights of others.
terms.dataOwnership.title: Data Ownership
terms.dataOwnership.paragraph1: You retain full ownership of all data you upload, create, or manage within the Family Tree App. We do not claim any ownership rights over your family data.
terms.dataOwnership.paragraph2: You can request to delete your data at any time, and we will comply with your request in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
terms.aiDisclaimer.title: AI Disclaimer
terms.aiDisclaimer.paragraph1: Our Service includes optional AI-powered features designed to assist you in managing your family tree, such as generating biographies or suggesting relationships. While we strive for accuracy, AI suggestions are generated by algorithms and may not always be factually correct or complete.
terms.aiDisclaimer.paragraph2: You acknowledge and agree that you are solely responsible for reviewing, verifying, and editing any AI-generated content before saving or sharing it. The Family Tree App is not liable for any inaccuracies or consequences arising from the use of AI-generated content.
terms.changesToTerms.title: Changes to Terms
terms.changesToTerms.paragraph1: We may update these Terms from time to time. If we make significant changes, we will notify you through the Service or by other means, such as email. Your continued use of the Service after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: Your privacy is critically important to us. This Privacy Policy describes how Family Tree App collects, uses, and protects your personal information and data when you use our Service.
privacy.dataWeCollect.title: Data We Collect
privacy.dataWeCollect.paragraph1: We collect information to provide and improve our Service. This includes:
privacy.dataWeCollect.item1: User Account Information: Your name, email address, and login credentials.
privacy.dataWeCollect.item2: Family Data: Information about family members, relationships, events, and any media you upload.
privacy.dataWeCollect.item3: AI-Generated Data: Content generated by our AI features based on your input or existing family data.
privacy.howWeUseData.title: How We Use Data
privacy.howWeUseData.paragraph1: We use the collected data for various purposes, including:
privacy.howWeUseData.item1: To provide, maintain, and improve our Service, including personalized AI suggestions.
privacy.howWeUseData.item2: To enhance features, develop new services, and analyze usage patterns.
privacy.howWeUseData.item3: To ensure data integrity, security, and compliance with our Terms of Service.
privacy.dataProtection.title: Data Protection
privacy.dataProtection.paragraph1: We implement robust security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include:
privacy.dataProtection.item1: Encryption: Data is encrypted both in transit and at rest.
privacy.dataProtection.item2: Limited Access: Access to your data is restricted to authorized personnel only.
privacy.dataProtection.item3: Compliance: We adhere to general privacy standards and best practices (e.g., GDPR-style principles).
privacy.thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
privacy.thirdPartyServices.paragraph1: We may use third-party services to support our operations, such as:
privacy.thirdPartyServices.item1: Authentication Providers: For secure user login (e.g., Auth0).
privacy.thirdPartyServices.item2: Notification Services: For sending important updates and alerts (e.g., Novu).
privacy.userRights.title: User Rights
privacy.userRights.paragraph1: You have certain rights regarding your data, including:
privacy.userRights.item1: Access: Request a copy of your personal data.
privacy.userRights.item2: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.
privacy.userRights.item3: Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data.
privacy.contactSection.title: Contact Us
privacy.contactSection.paragraph1: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or your data, please contact us at:
